Reviews.Title: I received the wrong phone.
Reviews.Author: Angela Farrell
Reviews.Content: I was hoping to receive a Sprint phone that would work on my network. Instead I received an Alltel phone which is an AT&T; company. It said it came with a charger as well and I did not get one.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: TextbookStore
Reviews.Content: I Have been using this phone for a long time, works extremely well. Green color is lime green, very attractive

Reviews.Title: broke within 2weeks
Reviews.Author: Evelyn M Ortega
Reviews.Content: Useless after 2 weeks wouldn't text unable to receive calls or call out.  Piece of Junk.  Battery did not last either

Reviews.Title: Fairly satisfied
Reviews.Author: Miranda Stefan "drummerchick2013"
Reviews.Content: The phone is great. It works with my existing sprint contract and I enjoy it for the most part. The only drawback was that not even 2 days after I opened it there was dust in between the screen and the plastic so when the screen is blank you can see all the dust in between. Other than that it has met my expectations.

ProductInfo.Features:
No contract Sprint cell phone ready to activate on Sprint wireless
Excellent Conditioned Pre-Owned Phone, You Will Be Very Satisfied
